skills.name: Abyssal Might
skills.description:
[SP: 0][CD: 25s] Launch a thrust attack, dealing 50% ATK of Physical DMG. If the thrust hits an enemy who is not in Invincibility or Iron Body state, it triggers a Throw ATK, controlling the target and dealing 90% + 1,000.0% ATK of Physical DMG. While an enemy is executing certain moves, wielder can unleash a Throw Counter unconditionally when the weapon skill button flashes, disabling the enemy and dealing 20% + 400.0% ATK of Physical DMG. This attack doesn't trigger CD.

Palatinus Equinox equip bonus: In Knight form, weapon skill becomes Throw ATK. In Guardian form, it becomes Cannon Blast:
Tap [Weapon] to unleash Cannon Blast which reload after 3 successive hits.
SEQ 1: 300% ATK of Physical DMG.
SEQ 2: 300% ATK of Physical DMG.
SEQ 3: 300% ATK of Physical DMG.
Tap [Weapon] after Special ATK to unleash Joint Cannon Blast:
SEQ 4 Joint Blast: 400% ATK of Physical DMG.
Shield Ram Joint Cannon Blast: 400% ATK of Physical DMG.
Equinox Severance Joint Cannon Blast: 3 x 350.0% ATK of Physical DMG.

skills.name: Karma Wheel
skills.description: Wielder's Crit Rate increases by 10.0%. Weapon skill deals 12.0% bonus Total DMG and 12.0% bonus Physical DMG.
